text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Volnovas'kyi Raion | native_name = Волноваський район | native_name_lang = uk | settlement_type = Raion | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Flag of Volnovakha Raion, Ukraine.svg | flag_alt = Flag of Volnovas'kyi Raion | image_shield = Volnovahskiy rayon gerb.png | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Volnovas'kyi Raion | image_map = Volnovakha Rayon 2020.svg | mapsize = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Oblast | subdivision_type2 = Raion | subdivision_name1 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 1923 | seat_type = Admin. center | seat = Volnovakha | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 4449.1 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 139014 | population_as_of = 2022 | population_density_km2 = auto | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Volnovakha Raion is a raion (district) in Donetsk oblast in eastern Ukraine. The administrative center of the district is Volnovakha. Russian soldiers are occupying part of the district (as of 2025). By 2024, Vuhledar (city) was under the control of Russian soldiers. ==Administrative divisions== ** Khlibodarivka (hromada) ** Komar ** Myrne ** Olhynka ** Staromlynivka, some Russian soldiers are there (2024's third quarter) ** Velyka Novosilka, some Russian soldiers are there (as of 2025) ** Volnovakha ** Vuhledar ==Related page== *Warfare in eastern Ukraine during the Russo-Ukrainian War ==Sources== Category:Raions of Ukraine Category:Raions of Donetsk Oblast
title: Volnovakha Raion
